input.sentences: i went to a convention today .
i met somebody that i thought i never would get the chance to meet .
i took crazy pictures with all of my friends .
i had a really awesome time at the convention .
output.sentences: The meeting of friends was going very well.
The friends ate a lot of food.
One friend gave a presentation using his laptop.
There was time to tell jokes and have fun.
It was even fun to say goodbye.
